scripts.compile:sass: sass --no-source-map sass/style.scss style.css && sass --no-source-map sass/style-main-new.scss style-main-new.css
scripts.minify:css: postcss style.css -o style.min.css && postcss style-main-new.css -o style-main-new.min.css
scripts.build:css: npm run compile:sass && npm run minify:css
